properties.exec.args: -classpath %classpath org.rub.nds.pdf.pdfsigner.PDFSigner -i ./src/main/resources/document_fields.pdf -o signed_ur3.pdf -pkcs ./src/main/resources/keystores/demo-rsa2048.p12 -password demo-rsa2048 -sigtype certified -transform ur3 -sigview visible -sigimg /media/sf_vladi/Dokumente/git/pdf-certification-attacker/PDFSigner/src/main/resources/PdfInsecurityTeam-Logo.png

-agentlib:jdwp=transport=dt_socket,server=n,address=${jpda.address} -classpath %classpath org.rub.nds.pdf.pdfsigner.PDFSigner -i ./src/main/resources/document_fields.pdf -o signed_fieldmdp.pdf -pkcs ./src/main/resources/keystores/demo-rsa2048.p12 -password demo-rsa2048 -sigtype certified -transform fieldmdp -fieldmpd_action inclusive -sigview visible -sigimg /media/sf_vladi/Dokumente/git/pdf-certification-attacker/PDFSigner/src/main/resources/PdfInsecurityTeam-Logo.png

-classpath %classpath org.rub.nds.pdf.pdfsigner.PDFSigner -i ./src/main/resources/document_fields.pdf -o signed_fieldmdp.pdf -pkcs ./src/main/resources/keystores/demo-rsa2048.p12 -password demo-rsa2048 -sigtype certified -transform fieldmdp -fieldmpd_action inclusive -sigview visible -sigimg /media/sf_vladi/Dokumente/git/pdf-certification-attacker/PDFSigner/src/main/resources/PdfInsecurityTeam-Logo.png
